key_risks: Supply chain disruptions impacting production and sales
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on consumer discretionary spending
Legal disputes with suppliers and a class-action securities lawsuit
Competitive pressures from other boat manufacturers
controversies: Class-action securities lawsuit alleging material misstatements or omissions
Legal disputes with suppliers, including Tommy's Boats
environmental_issues: Compliance with stringent environmental regulations in the marine industry
governance_issues: Potential reputational damage from ongoing legal challenges
